data.title: Accelerate your bulk workflows using Workflow Builder
data.description.plaintext: Combine various tasks like Batch Rename, Image Resize, Format Conversion, and Metadata template to create your own Workflows for repeat use. Use the Workflow Builder workspace in Bridge to stitch multiple tasks and run it by just dragging and dropping your creative assets on workflow presets. Create PDF contact sheets using the Output workspace and publish multiple assets directly to your Adobe Stock or Adobe Portfolio easily from Bridge using the Publish panel.

data.title: Seamless photos management with powerful preview & selection workflows
data.description.plaintext: Visualize all of your creative assets with thumbnails and rich preview, zoom features. Organize your assets with labels, ratings, metadata and keywords. Use advanced filters, collections and search to find the assets you are looking for. Edit your assets by opening them directly in Adobe Creative Cloud applications. Import and preview RAW images. Convert to DNG. Unleash powerful editing capabilities of Adobe Camera RAW and Photoshop from Bridge.

data.title: Do more with your video assets in Bridge
data.description.plaintext: Scrub video thumbnails on mouse hover in Bridge Content panel. Storyboard by manually sorting multiple video assets in Bridge and add them directly to Premiere Pro sequence for editing. Encode or stitch videos in Adobe Media Encoder directly from Bridge.

data.title: Visually Manage your Substance 3D materials in Bridge
data.description.plaintext: Manage and preview your Substance 3D material libraries in a visually rich way, check and edit Metadata and seamlessly send assets to Substance 3D products from Bridge in seconds.
